price: Lalle ne waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyuka na ƙwarai, Mai rahama zai sanya musu so.*
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا
footnotes: * Wanda ya bi Allah da gaskiya, Allah zai sanya zukãtan mutãne su sõ shi kamar yadda yake a cikin Hadisi wanda Imãm Tirmizi ya ruwaito daga sa'ad da Abu Huraira.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sayajʿalu lahumu al-raḥmānu wuddan
